data.what_is:
Zoho Marketing Plus is a unified marketing platform that enables marketing teams to collaborate, create, and execute campaigns across all channels, including email, social media, webinars, SMS, surveys, and online events. Your team can also measure the real ROI of all your marketing efforts on a unified dashboard, plan your marketing budget, track all marketing expenses, and more--all in one place.

With Zoho Marketing Plus, you can ensure your customers have the most delightful experience possible with your brand, while simultaneously making the workload easier for your marketing teams.
data.product_description: Zoho Marketing Plus is a unified marketing platform for marketing teams that provides enhanced visibility into your marketing process and real-time collaboration features so that you can run successful campaigns. With a centralized workspace for project management, you can create activities, assign them to different marketers, view your timeline, and track progress--all from one window. Key functionalities of the platform include unified brand management, omnichannel engagement, marketing automation, and brand asset management.
data.supported_languages: German, English, French, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Turkish, Chinese (Simplified)

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zoho Marketing Plus?
Transitioning in b2b role for b2c role was a nightmare at the beginning, instead of relying on cold calling my job now required to generate leads, sort them out and Target prospects depending where the ground team is in use.
It was tough to get a hang of it at the beginning but Zoho's interface really helped me in running campaign reaching out to prospects, focusing on clients who showed even a slight interest, best part was that I could automate many tasks such as posts, at what time the email would be send as it makes the difference where your email is landed when prospects open their inbox.

Few additional features that I Loved was it's collaborative nature, seamless integration with other crms we use, can run multiple campaigns and to create a report.

What do you dislike about Zoho Marketing Plus?
I think the biggest drawback I mentioned was the learning curve and also uploading data from our previous marketing software was a hassle.

What problems is Zoho Marketing Plus solving and how is that benefiting you?
One shop solution for all marketing needs and several inefficiency in marketing operations

initial_reviews.review_title: Truly the best Unified Marketing Platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Zoho Marketing Plus?
All-in-one marketing platform with built-in features like an email marketing tool, social media management tool, webinar, surveys, marketing automation, analytics, website management, and a lot more all in one UI without any additional integration or purchase.

What do you dislike about Zoho Marketing Plus?
There is nothing to dislike about Zoho Marketing Plus. If you are a new small business or a big enterprise, Marketing Plus caters to all your needs

What problems is Zoho Marketing Plus solving and how is that benefiting you?
Zoho Marketing Plus is breaking silos among marketing team members - copywriters, designers, digital marketers, CMOS, and other decision-makers by providing all insights in one place, enabling seamless collaboration among them, and complete visibility on the marketing campaign pipeline.

I am a product marketer and with Zoho Marketing Plus, I can manage marketing campaigns end-to-end all in one place.

What do you dislike about Zoho Marketing Plus?

Any Tool can only assit you and your marketing team to do a great job. However with Zoho Marketing Plus some of the marking activities can be automated. Hence it will help in reduction of Marketing team labour cost.
